results.name: Decimal expansion of a nested radical: sqrt(1^2 + sqrt(2^2 + sqrt(3^2 + ...
link: Herman P. Robinson, The CSR Function, Popular Computing (Calabasas, CA), Vol. 4 (No. 35, Feb 1976), pages PC35-3 to PC35-4. Annotated and scanned copy.
mathematica: k = 64; r = 65; While[k > 0, r = Sqrt[k^2 + r]; k-- ]; RealDigits[r, 10, 111][[1]] (* _Robert G. Wilson v_, Nov 04 2004 *)
xref: Cf. A072449, A099874, A099876 to A099878 for other nested radicals.
results.author: Mark Hudson (mrmarkhudson(AT)hotmail.com), Nov 03 2004
